Past VizSec Events

Since 2004, VizSec has been proudly associated with many conferences. Most recently, VizSec has been associated with IEEE VIS. Below we list the previous VizSec events.

You can also explore VizSec Papers, a visualization for browsing and searching VizSec papers, created by Fabian Fischer.

Past Events

VizSec 2015

Proceedings
Website
12th International Symposium on Visualization for Cyber Security
Located with IEEE VIS in Chicago, Illinois, USA
Held October 26
Acceptance rate: 11/34 (32%)

VizSec 2014

Proceedings
Website
11th International Symposium on Visualization for Cyber Security
Located with IEEE VIS in Paris, France
Held November 10
Acceptance rate: 12/43 (28%)

VizSec 2013

Proceedings
Website
10th International Symposium on Visualization for Cyber Security
Located with IEEE VIS in Atlanta GA, USA
Held October 14, 2013
Acceptance rate: 9/30 (30%)

VizSec 2012

Proceedings
Website
9th International Symposium on Visualization for Cyber Security
Located with IEEE Vis Week in Seattle, WA, USA
Held October 15
Acceptance rate: 12 / 21 (57%)

VizSec 2011

Proceedings
Website
8th International Symposium on Visualization for Cyber Security
Located with SOUPS in Pittsburgh, PA, USA
Held July 20
Acceptance rate: 6 / 11 (55%)

VizSec 2010

Proceedings
Website
7th International Symposium on Visualization for Cyber Security
Located with RAID in Ottawa, ON, Canada
Held September 14
Acceptance rate: 12 / 27 (44%)

Proceedings
Website

Held October 11
Acceptance rate: 10 / 23 (43%)

Website
